## **As a [role] I want [goal/desire] for [benefit].**

**Acceptance criteria**

- [ ] Assume [precondition] if [action] then [result].
- [ ] Assume [precondition] if [action] then [result].
- [ ] Assume [precondition] if [action] then [result].
- [ ] Assume [precondition] if [action] then [result].
- [ ] Assume [precondition] if [action] then [result].
